mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id AS projectId, p.name AS name, p.status AS status, p.start_date AS startDate, p.end_date AS endDate, pm.is_favorite AS isFavorite FROM Project p JOIN ProjectMember pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pm.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND pm.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY pm.is_favorite DESC, p.name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DailyReport WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND report_date = #{date}

SELECT t.task_id AS taskId, t.title AS title, t.priority AS priority FROM Task t JOIN TaskUser tu ON t.task_id = tu.task_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId} AND tu.user_id = #{userId} AND t.status != 'DONE' AND t.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY t.priority DESC, t.due_date ASC LIMIT 5
